code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{UserAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Signup=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const{createUser}=UserAuth();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');try{await createUser(email,password);navigate('/account');}catch(e){setError(e.message);console.log(e.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-[700px] mx-auto my-16 p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold py-2",children:"Sign up for a free account"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"py-2",children:["Already have an account yet?",' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"underline",children:"Sign in."})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col py-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"py-2 font-medium",children:"Email Address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),className:"border p-3",type:"email"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col py-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"py-2 font-medium",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"border p-3",type:"password"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"border border-blue-500 bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-500 w-full p-4 my-2 text-white",children:"Sign Up"})]})]});};export default Signup;
